> dolphinscheduler just executes the start command,
> Services like datax need to be deployed by themselves.

not happy, 囧.

i have same error.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56470572/84730638-51918500-afc9-11ea-9add-018190dc27d3.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56470572/84730742-a6cd9680-afc9-11ea-85f9-8bbc4ef57876.png)

There is no error log here, and it never ends.

I guess httpclient has already hung！
Is this task being done?

I implemented one, but the web was ugly


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39816903/84732638-c61af280-afce-11ea-8c80-092acdcf3d6d.png)

You can edit[ worker.properties ].
[ worker.group=default ]Configure workgroup,
But a worker server can only belong to one work group

I have the same needs as you
It's just that I have implemented the work group function

> i have same error.
> 
> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56470572/84730638-51918500-afc9-11ea-9add-018190dc27d3.png)
> 
> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56470572/84730742-a6cd9680-afc9-11ea-85f9-8bbc4ef57876.png)
> 
> There is no error log here, and it never ends.
> 
> I guess httpclient has already hung！

Judging from the logs you provide, it looks like the http client is down.
I think you can test the task of Sqoop map is 1, that is, there is only one yarn app id to see if it can return to the success status normally. If it can, I suspect that the length of the database app_link field limits the length. If not, it is suspected to be Your Hadoop related settings.

> 有没有人使用过ds的API，在自己的大数据平台里调用dsAPI查看任务状态和控制任务执行的需求，分享一下整合的过程流程，感谢

have never done it. 
But I think it should not be difficult, because DS has a log service on each worker, and most of the task status of DS will be stored in the database, which can be obtained from the database.

> You can edit[ worker.properties ].
> [ worker.group=default ]Configure workgroup,
> But a worker server can only belong to one work group
> 
> I have the same needs as you
> It's just that I have implemented the work group function

I've implement this issue in newest dev branch, I think you can help to review. Thx a lot.
[#2934 ]
OK, I will, thank you

> 有没有人使用过ds的API，在自己的大数据平台里调用dsAPI查看任务状态和控制任务执行的需求，分享一下整合的过程流程，感谢

I did not do this before, but there is the api doc I think that can help you.
[Api doc](http://106.75.43.194:8888/dolphinscheduler/doc.html?language=zh_CN&lang=zh)

The task is killed in the middle of running.
For two consecutive days, the offline scheduling task was inexplicably killed, resulting in subsequent tasks blocking.
If there is not enough memory or CPU, the task should be in a waiting state and should not be kill.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57088544/84738347-57449600-afdc-11ea-9f5d-da1dded651a6.png)
@superScala Thanks for your contributions . Since no others have an opposite options ,I merged this PR

My version is 1.2, yours is version 1.3, the format is correct
You can find out which server this path is on.
I think the possible situation is:
The worker of the task you are performing should not be on the same server as the api server. It is executed on another worker server, and the ip obtained is the local 127.0.0.1, not the actual ip, you can see the hosts configuration mapping

At the same time, you can look at the IP of the monitoring center -> worker page


我的版本是1.2，你的是1.3版本，格式正确
你可以找下这个路径是在哪个服务器上。
我觉得有可能情况是：
你执行的任务的worker应该不是和api server在同一个服务器上。是在另一台worker服务器上执行，然后获取的ip是本地127.0.0.1，不是实际ip,你可以看下hosts配置映射

同时你可以看下监控中心->worker  页面的ip ，截图如下

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3055810/84739029-7859b680-afdd-11ea-9775-18c4fb74b656.png)

Thanks for the reply, I checked my hosts configuration and there is no problem, then the monitoring page is as follows
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10054719/84739850-f23e6f80-afde-11ea-8cc8-8534ef889fec.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10054719/84739881-fa96aa80-afde-11ea-9057-d40b00e21cc4.png)

hosts config is as follows:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10054719/84739764-d63ace00-afde-11ea-9ac2-03538c1d05b4.png)

The problem is the same as #2515, it has been resolved in dev_1.3.0 
Please update the title in English, thanks!

you can see this issue ,#2409
 If there are changes, restart the service to see if the worker ip changes
如果有修改，需要重启下服务看worker ip 是否改变

Thanks, the problem is solved, execute `sudo hostnamectl set-hostname dc-ds-01` on both machines, `sudo hostnamectl set-hostname dc-ds-02`, restart the service and it’s ok。
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10054719/84744009-464c5280-afe5-11ea-8aab-5be7ac52777f.png)

Are all worker servers working normally？is there any worker server shutdown or not work? 

usually,  if the worker server works fine, the task can't be killed,  the running task will be killed and then recover if worker server shutdown
please update/add title in English, thx

**error log**
use python mode
任务执行时，masterServer会先向表t_ds_task_instance插入一条数据，workServer再从任务队列中消费，会进行“if (verifyTaskInstanceIsNull(taskInstance)) {”的判断，特殊场景下，这里会判断失败。大概原因就是t_ds_task_instance表的数据还未插入成功，但workserver已经启动了。希望有人能解决这个问题
yes of course you can, if only datax support the reader source or write r source, you can use it to synchronize data
this is not a bug, in ds-1.3.0, when exec task with resource file, the resoruce dir will be create in ds-worker exec path, so you should add the dir for the resoruce file. like : sh tcms/xxxxx.sh

yarn.application.status.address  this parameter already set ? you can refer to this issue https://github.com/apache/incubator-dolphinscheduler/issues/2491

There are many tasks running at the same time, but only one task is killed

All servers are working

There are many tasks running at the same time, but only one task is killed

You can't find the reason of being killed by checking the log
This problem is caused by  time zone,You can refer to this issue #2485

> @yangyichao-mango What's purpose of this PR? Why are there so many irrelevant files to change ?

Thx a lot for your review @gabrywu .

This PR is essentially to get the abnormal exit value caused by the error (exceptions caused by permissions, etc.) when the worker starts to create the working directory, to judge if the user info and work dir is created successfully.

But after my change, I found that if the worker failed to create the working directory, the exception it threw would be caught, only recorded in the log of the worker node, not in the log of a single task instance. Although the task will fail at the end of execution, the exception log is very few and it is difficult to locate the exception (permission exception, etc.) directly. 

In my opinion, I understand that this error should fail fast, or at least recorded by logs. So in order to match the change of my exitval judgment work, I put the initialization change of tasklogger to  the beginning of `TaskExecuteProcessor`. And I understand that the task logger should record all the logs related to the task, not only the task runtime logs.

If I have any misunderstanding, please give me suggestions.

------------------------------

非常感谢你的review。

这个pr本质上是为了获取在worker执行task时创建工作目录时的错误（由于权限导致的问题等）值，来判断工作目录，用户权限是否创建成功。

但是在改动完成后，我发现如果worker创作工作目录失败其抛出的异常会被catch住，异常信息只会在worker节点的日志中被记录下来，不会在单个task的日志中记录下来，这相当于创建工作目录相关的所有错误信息完全不会被直接外显给用户。虽然最后task执行的时候会失败，但是异常日志非常少，很难直接定位到工作目录中的异常（权限异常等）。

我理解这种错误应该fail-fast，或者至少有日志来记录，所以为了配合我这次针对exitval判断的改动，我就把taskLogger的初始化改动到了最前面，用来记录涉及到这个task的所有日志。并且我理解taskLogger的原本目的就是用来记录所有涉及到这个task的日志，不仅仅是task运行时的日志。

如果我有理解不正确的地方，敬请指出。

Solution:

update config file :   application-api.properties

add config:

spring.jackson.time-zone=GMT+8
The Datax node is support custom json config (datax json), don't know if it meets you needs.

我这也是这个问题。没有做特别的操作，查看了下端口，一直间断性的有explorer。exe发消息好像

Hi, sorry for late reply. Log client will connect log server with 50051 port. If the port binds by other process, the log request can send out, but response will be checked by the log client. DS defines it's self binary protocol , and if the response is not valid, it will throw the exception you see, and the channel will close immediately. 
So, if you meet the same issue next time, try to find the process that bind the port(50051), and kill it. then restart the log server.

@Wf675721680 another same issue created ,I will close this one.

> > @yangyichao-mango What's purpose of this PR? Why are there so many irrelevant files to change ?
> 
> Thx a lot for your review @gabrywu .
> 
> This PR is essentially to get the abnormal exit value caused by the error (exceptions caused by permissions, etc.) when the worker starts to create the working directory, to judge if the user info and work dir is created successfully.
> 
> But after my change, I found that if the worker failed to create the working directory, the exception it threw would be caught, only recorded in the log of the worker node, not in the log of a single task instance. Although the task will fail at the end of execution, the exception log is very few and it is difficult to locate the exception (permission exception, etc.) directly.
> 
> In my opinion, I understand that this error should fail fast, or at least recorded by logs. So in order to match the change of my exitval judgment work, I put the initialization change of tasklogger to the beginning of `TaskExecuteProcessor`. And I understand that the task logger should record all the logs related to the task, not only the task runtime logs.
> 
> If I have any misunderstanding, please give me suggestions.
> 
> 非常感谢你的review。
> 
> 这个pr本质上是为了获取在worker执行task时创建工作目录时的错误（由于权限导致的问题等）值，来判断工作目录，用户权限是否创建成功。
> 
> 但是在改动完成后，我发现如果worker创作工作目录失败其抛出的异常会被catch住，异常信息只会在worker节点的日志中被记录下来，不会在单个task的日志中记录下来，这相当于创建工作目录相关的所有错误信息完全不会被直接外显给用户。虽然最后task执行的时候会失败，但是异常日志非常少，很难直接定位到工作目录中的异常（权限异常等）。
> 
> 我理解这种错误应该fail-fast，或者至少有日志来记录，所以为了配合我这次针对exitval判断的改动，我就把taskLogger的初始化改动到了最前面，用来记录涉及到这个task的所有日志。并且我理解taskLogger的原本目的就是用来记录所有涉及到这个task的日志，不仅仅是task运行时的日志。
> 
> 如果我有理解不正确的地方，敬请指出。
